problem_definition.command_line: mpiexec fluidity gls-StationPapa-orig.flml; mpiexec fluidity gls-StationPapa-param.flml;

variables.variable:
import numpy as np import vtktools from gls_ocean_param import get_1d_indices
u = vtktools.vtu("gls-StationPapa-orig_1.vtu") pos = u.GetLocations() ind = get_1d_indices(pos) depths = np.array([-pos[i, 2] for i in ind])

import numpy as np import vtktools from gls_ocean_param import get_1d_indices
u = vtktools.vtu("gls-StationPapa-orig_1.vtu") pos = u.GetLocations() ind = get_1d_indices(pos) k = u.GetScalarField("GLSTurbulentKineticEnergy") TKE_orig = np.array([k[i] for i in ind])

import numpy as np import vtktools from gls_ocean_param import get_1d_indices
u = vtktools.vtu("gls-StationPapa-param_1.vtu") pos = u.GetLocations() ind = get_1d_indices(pos) k = u.GetScalarField("GLSTurbulentKineticEnergy") TKE_param = np.array([k[i] for i in ind])
